title: AUTHORITY PRODUCT CODE
description:
The AUTHORITY PRODUCT CODE is a product code provided by a HEALTH AUTHORITY for the identification of a medicinal product in the respective JURISDICTION. The AUTHORITY PRODUCT CODE may be used for identification of a medicinal product during (partial) manufacturing in a JURISDICTION and therefore is generally independent of any MAKETING AUTHORIZATION Number.
The AUHORITY PRODUCT CODE is provided by a HEALTH AUTHORITY and therefore maintained in the Registration Information Management (RIM) system. It is maintained at the PRODUCT COMPOSITION, COMBINED PRODUCT COMPOSITION and/or VALENCE PRODUCT COMPOSITION, respectively.

code.title: productCode
code.description: The Authority Product Code is the code that is provided by a HEALTH AUTHORITY to identify a medicinal product that is relevant to its JURISDICTION.

authorityAbbreviationSapCode.title: authority.sapCode
authorityAbbreviationSapCode.description: The SAP Code is a reference to the MDG Business Partner Identifier of the corresponding HEALTH AUTHORITY.

authorityAbbreviationId.title: authority.referenceDataId
authorityAbbreviationId.description: The Reference Data ID is the (technical) Identifier of all REFERNCE DATA maintained in the Reference Data Management System.
